title: Bug 49536: Accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404 when no webapps deployed
description: When accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content, instead of an expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, the server returns a HTTP code 200 OK response with no content.
EB: The server should return an HTTP error 404 response when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Start a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed. 
2. Access a URL on the server. 
3. Observe the HTTP response code and check if it is returning 200 OK instead of 404.
